meta.title: Carousel
meta.description: The <b-carousel> component is a slideshow for cycling through a series of content, built with CSS 3D transforms. It works with a series of images, text, or custom markup.

components.description: The <b-carousel> component is a slideshow for cycling through a series of slide content

props.description: Set the CSS color of the carousel's background
Enable the previous and next controls
When set, changes the slide animation to a crossfade instead of a sliding effect
Set the default image 'height' attribute for all b-tab children
Set the default image 'width' attribute for all b-tab children
Enable the indicator buttons for jumping to specific slides
Set the delay time (in milliseconds) between slides
Sets the prefix for the 'aria-label' on the slide indicator controls. Will be suffixed with the slide number (1 indexed)
Sets the 'aria-label' on the indicator controls wrapper
Sets the 'aria-label' value for the next slide control
Sets the 'aria-label' value for the previous slide control
When set, disables animation when transitioning between slides
When set, disables the pausing of the slide show when the current slide is hovered
Disable controlling the slides via touch swipes
Do not restart the slide show when then end is reached
The currently active slide (zero-indexed)

events.description: Emitted when transitioning to a new slide has ended

args.description: Slide number that was slid to

events.description: Emitted when transitioning to a new slide has started

args.description: Slide number that is being slid to

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content (slides) to place in the carousel

components.description: The <b-carousel-slide> component is a slide to be placed in the <b-carousel>

props.description: CSS color to use as the slide's background color
Text content to place in the caption
HTML string content to place in the caption
Specify the HTML tag to render instead of the default tag for the caption wrapper
Specify the HTML tag to render instead of the default tag for the content wrapper
Specify the breakpoint that the textual content will start to be shown. Leave at default to always show the textual content
Sets the value of the 'alt' attribute on the image
If set, will render a blank image instead of the img-src
Set the CSS color to use as the fill of the blank image
Set the default image 'height' attribute for all b-tab children
Sets the URL of the image
Set the default image 'width' attribute for all b-tab children
Text content to place in the text of the slide
HTML string content to place in the text of the slide

slots.name: default
slots.description: Content to place in the carousel slide

slots.name: img
slots.description: Slot for img element or image component
